meta.name: Midnight Mass
meta.description: Live coverage of midnight mass attended by various dignitries from the church airs every Christmas Eve on the BBC.

videos.title: Midnight Mass from Our Lady of the English Martyrs, Cambridge
videos.overview: A live celebration of the First Mass of the Nativity with carols, readings and the traditional blessing of the crib. Led by the Rt Rev Monsignor Canon Harkness.
